LanguageData.MizuInfiniteDaysWorthOfWaterInfo: Will never run out of water
LanguageData.MizuDaysWorthOfWaterTooltip: An approximate number of days before the caravan runs out of water.
LanguageData.MizuDaysWorthOfWaterWarningDialog: Your caravan only has {0} days worth of water and will become thirsty very quickly.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
LanguageData.MizuDaysWorthOfWaterWarningDialog_NoWate: Your caravan has no water and will become thirsty very quickly.\n\nAre you sure you want to form this caravan?
LanguageData.MizuCommandDesignateOpenCloseValveDesc: Designate this valve to be opened or closed. A colonist will come soon to perform the task.
LanguageData.MizuCommandDesignateDrainTankDesc: Switch between start/stop draining water. A colonist will come soon to perform the task.
LanguageData.MizuCannotBuildMultiWaterworksBuilding: You can't build more than one kind of waterworks building at the same cell
LanguageData.MizuCantBuildExceptOverWater: You can't build except over water
LanguageData.MizuDesignatorAreaSnowGetExpandDesc: Create a area which colonists will try to get snow.
LanguageData.MizuDesignatorAreaSnowGetClearDesc: Removes a snow getting area. Colonists will no longer try to get snow from this area.
